welcome_benefits: 2,000 Bonus EazyPoints, Complimentary Membership of EazyDiner Prime, and Postcard Hotel Stay Voucher Worth ₹7,500

Rewards Rate: 10 Reward Points for Hotel, Travel, Shopping, and Entertainment Spends (~1%). 4 Reward Points/₹100 on All Other Spends (~0.4%)
Reward Redemption: Redeem Points for Payment of Bills via PayEazy on EazyDiner. 1 RP = ₹0.10
Travel: Postcard Hotels Stay Voucher as Welcome and Renewal Benefit

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Fuel Surcharge Waiver on Transactions Between ₹500 and ₹3,000
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the withdrawn amount subject to a minimum of Rs. 300.

product_details: A welcome bonus of 2,000 EazyPoints once the card’s joining fee is paid.
Complimentary EazyDiner Prime annual membership that gets renewed every year.
Up to 50% extra discount on dining spends via the PayEazy on the EazyDiner app.
